text: The 2023 AFL Grand Final was an Australian Rules Football match to decide the winner of the 2023 AFL season. The match was held on 30 September 2023 and won by the Collingwood Magpies, who defeated the Brisbane Lions by just four points. The Collingwood Magpies faced the Brisbane Lions in the Grand Final. It also marked 20 years since Brisbane beat Collingwood at the 2003 Grand Final. ==Scoreboard== ==References== Category:2023 in sports Category:2023 in Australia Category:VFL/AFL Grand Finals
title: 2023 AFL Grand Final
